title: Honorable opponent banner never showed
body: I opened my league account yesterday Morning, and I got an opening notification saying that I had gained an Honorable opponent banner so when I played a game it didn't show up, I thought it was just taking time to load, or that I would have to log back in to get it, and I know it was a banner notification since my friend got a Teamwork one a few weeks for me, and he got his straight away, so I was wondering why haven't I got my banner or do I have to set it or something?
